author: Daniel Greene
description:
Today we’re digging into the Shadow Light Press controversy. A publishing contract attributed to Shadow Light Press was shared publicly, and many authors and industry commenters have flagged it as HORRIBLE!
Writers Beware: https://writerbeware.blog/2025/12/19/why-these-contract-clauses-are-scary/ 
All posts can still be found here: https://www.reddit.com/r/ProgressionFantasy/ 

This video is informational and not legal advice. Always consult a qualified attorney before signing any contract.
